titleStmt.title: Life eternall or, A treatise of the knowledge of the divine essence and attributes Delivered in XVIII. sermons. By the late faithfull and worthy minister of Iesus Christ, Iohn Preston, D. in Divinity, chaplaine in ordinary to his Majestie, master of Emmanuel Colledge in Cambridge, and sometimes preacher of Lincolns Inne.
titleStmt.author: Preston, John, 1587-1628.
Ball, Thomas, 1589 or 90-1659.
Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: By R[ichard] B[adger] and are to be sold by Nicholas Bourne at the Royall Exchange, and by Rapha Harford, in Pater-noster Row, in Queenes-head Alley, at the signe of the guilt Bible,

notesStmt.note: Editors' dedication signed: Thomas Goodwin, Thomas Ball.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
"The tenth sermon" (caption title) begins new pagination on 2A1r.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pater-noster Row, in Queenes-head Alley, at the signe of the guilt Bible
